blogPost.excerpt: Answer a few questions, and we’ll transform your memories into a tiny, personalised book filled with: ✔️Your responses ✔️Fun facts, including from your home country ✔️Whimsical illustrations It is 100% free and you’ll receive your booklet in under 10 minutes!
blogPost.body: Answer a few questions, and we’ll transform your memories into a tiny, personalised book filled with: ✔️Your responses ✔️Fun facts, including from your home country ✔️Whimsical illustrations It is 100% free and you’ll receive your booklet in under 10 minutes!
blogPost.title: Time Capsule - Transform your 2020 into a tiny, personalized book for free!
blogPost.author: Zaake De Coninck

localize.description: 回答几个问题，我们将把你的记忆变成一本小小的、个性化的书，里面有 ✔️你的回答 ✔️有趣的事实，包括来自你的家乡 ✔️奇思妙想的插图 100%免费，你将在10分钟内收到你的小册子!
localize.tagline: 将你的2020年免费改造成一本小小的个性书!

localize.description: 回答幾個問題，我們將把你的記憶變成一本小小的、個性化的書，裏面有 ✔️你的回答 ✔️有趣的事實，包括來自你的家鄉 ✔️奇思妙想的插圖 100%免費，你將在10分鐘內收到你的小冊子!
localize.tagline: 將你的2020年免費改造成一本小小的個性書!

previous.excerpt: Free mobile app that helps the 50 million microbusinesses in Latin America become more efficient. The app allows owners to record transactions, track credits and debits, see business statistics, gain control over their inventory, among many other things.
previous.title: Treinta - Digital ledger app for Latin American microbusinesses

localize.description: 免费的移动应用，帮助拉美5000万微商提高工作效率。该应用允许企业主记录交易、跟踪贷记和借记、查看业务统计、控制库存等。
localize.tagline: 拉美微型企业的数字账本应用

localize.description: 免費的移動應用，幫助拉美5000萬微商提高工作效率。該應用允許企業主記錄交易、跟蹤貸記和借記、查看業務統計、控制庫存等。
localize.tagline: 拉美微型企業的數字賬本應用

next.excerpt: The Intricately Assistant sits alongside the Google Chrome browser, automatically displaying real-time cloud data on prospects you and your team research. See your prospects’ cloud footprints, in our most actionable delivery platform yet.
next.title: The Intricately Assistant - A new chrome extension to accelerate your sales prospecting

localize.description: Intricately Assistant与谷歌Chrome浏览器并驾齐驱，自动显示你和你的团队研究的潜在客户的实时云数据。在我们迄今为止最具可操作性的交付平台上，查看您的潜在客户的云足迹。
localize.tagline: 一个新的chrome扩展，以加快您的销售前景。

localize.description: Intricately Assistant與谷歌Chrome瀏覽器並駕齊驅，自動顯示你和你的團隊研究的潛在客戶的實時雲數據。在我們迄今爲止最具可操作性的交付平臺上，查看您的潛在客戶的雲足跡。
localize.tagline: 一個新的chrome擴展，以加快您的銷售前景。
